overview:
Aaron Long is the Vice President of Professional Services and an equity partner at Schipul - The Web Marketing Company (www.schipul.com). An accomplished artist, animator and businessman, Aaron is responsible for overseeing the client teams and sales & marketing operations for Schipul and Tendenciâ„¢ - Membership Management Software.

Prior to this role, Aaron has served as Business Development Director & Creative Director for Schipul. As Creative Director, Aaron piloted online marketing for hundreds of clients from around the globe. Some of the team’s past achievements have been discovering new ways to measure web analytics, integrating social software that helps business, and educating the community on the best way to reach a market and have money left over for profit.

Prior to joining Schipul, Aaron worked as part of a large design team producing a variety of print material, interactive games and demos, and television commercials. He was much loved by his students while working for the Art Institute of Houston as an animation instructor. He also spent several years with two major animation studios, working on major full-length animated films for both Warner Brothers and DreamWorks, including Space Jam and The Prince of Egypt.

Aaron is a graduate of Texas Tech University with a B.F.A. in Studio Art. He is also a family man, draws a mean caricature, and can find an image on a Google search faster than any other human being alive.
